name: BlindDrop Design Inc.
tagline: Custom Web Design, Serving Cochrane & Calgary
description:
Calgary and Cochrane Web Design services including graphic design, custom WordPress development and managed WordPress hosting. 
We provide professional solutions to a wide variety of local businesses in Alberta and across Canada. By focusing on high quality optimization of all aspects of site design, content development and social media integration we can provide a powerful and successful brand for your company online.
Our clients enjoy world-class managed WordPress hosting that ensures peace of mind, ease of management and fast page load speeds, all of which facilitate a strong, persistent online presence.
